segments.text: What are you waiting for ? Get on that bus quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But where do I get a ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On the bus . The driver collects the fares . You'll have to take your luggage on board .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I wish I didn â€™ t have so much to carry .
segments.speaker: S2
